data.event: As the population was less than 100 at the 2011 Census details are kept in the ward of Dormanstown.

event.title: was sold to ICI in the 1940s

data.event: Wilton Castle was sold to ICI in the 1940s.

event.title: built on the site of a medieval castle, now

data.event: Wilton Castle is an early 19th-century mansion house, built on the site of a medieval castle, now converted into residential apartments.
In 1331 Ralph Bulmer was granted permission to build a castle on his manor.

event.title: was lost again, by sequestration in 1644

data.event: The manor was restored to their son but was lost again, by sequestration in 1644, following Sir William Bulmers opposition to Parliament during the English Civil War.
